TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Qapedang, title = Qapedang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qapedang} }

S.FORM: alang Qapedang ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Taybu go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 308 buwan, 1,146 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 98% kyan ku 1,119 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 2% kyan ku 27 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 94%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Qapedang hya' ga Kaviyangan. tay mkyahu' na Qapedang hya' ga Piyuma. tay 'llaw na Qapedang hya' ga Ulaljuc. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Qapedang ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Taybo go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 308 bowan, 1,146 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 98% kyan ko 1,119 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 2% kyan ko 27 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 94%, Bonon 1%, Amis 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Qapedang hya' ga Kaviyangan. tay mkyaho' na Qapedang hya' ga Piyoma. tay 'llaw na Qapedang hya' ga Ulaljoc. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
